Title: SharePoint 2007 Solution and Packaging Guidance
Description: WSPSolution is a standard for building SP 2007 solutions in Visual Studio, namespace planning, deployment planning, WSP creation, and build automation.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
WSPSolution is a standard for building SP 2007 solutions in Visual Studio, namespace planning, deployment planning, WSP creation, and build automation.

This project is based on the guidance found in the post: Building and Packaging SharePoint Solutions. The post refers to two utilities (WSPBuilder and SPDisposeCheck) that should be downloaded separately and placed in the intended folders.
